body.name: Marvel Playskool Heroes Super Hero Adventures Ultimate Set, 10 Collectible 2.5-Inch Action Figures, Toys for Kids Ages 3 and Up (Amazon Exclusive)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 34 mins
features: AGE OF ULTRON COLLECTION SET: The 10 figure Ultimate Super Hero Set is inspired by the characters from the Marvel movie Avengers: Age of Ultron
10 ICONIC MARVEL CHARACTERS: The toy set comes with Captain America, Hulk, Marvel’s Black Widow, Iron Man, Marvel’s Hawkeye, Thor, Nick Fury, Marvel’s Vision, Ultron, and Ultron’s Sentry figures
IMAGINATIVE PLAY: With this action figure set, kids ages 3 and up can engage in imaginative play, recreating the fun of their favorite scenes from the movie and imagining their own adventures

COLLECTIBLE TOYS: These 10 collectible 2.5 inch action figures are great for boys and girls to start an instant collection, build on an already existing collection, swap with friends, or give as gifts

BIG HERO FUN FOR MARVEL FANS: Marvel Super Hero Adventure toys and playsets are sized right for small hands. They make fun gifts for kids whether they’re new Marvel fans or already collect Marvel toys
body.description: Preschoolers can imagine saving the day alongside the Avengers with this toy set, featuring some of Marvel’s most iconic characters! The Playskool Heroes Marvel Super Hero Adventures collectible toys lets kids ages 3 and up recreate favorite action scenes from the Avengers: Age of Ultron movie. The fun doesn’t end there, though, as boys and girls can imagine their own adventures! The Captain America, Iron Man, Thor, Hulk, Marvel’s Black Widow, and other included figures provide big fun, but are sized right for small hands. Featuring simple articulation, each figure can be posed to fit any mission kids can imagine. Playtime with the Ultimate Super Hero Set can take pretending to save the day with the Avengers to an epic level, and with 10 2.5 inch action figures, kids can start a collection, add to one, or swap with friends! Copyright MARVEL. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Playskool and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Corporate Social Responsibility Hasbro is committed to being an ethical and responsible company and is a recognized toy industry leader in the areas of product safety, environmental sustainability, ethical sourcing and philanthropy. Playskool Heroes Marvel Super Hero Adventures Ultimate Super Hero Set Ultron and his Sentry are up to no good! They’re coming after the Avengers and trying to destroy their headquarters. ..will the Super Heroes be able to team up and save the day? The adventure is up to your little one’s imagination! 10 figures for awesome Super Hero matchups. Simple articulation Sized right for little hands. Pretend to save the day with the Avengers figures.

Big Time Teamwork Being a Super Hero is all about teamwork. When Ultron and his Sentry are up to no good, the Super Heroes of the Marvel Universe know exactly what to do. The Avengers always have what it takes to save the day! Little Super Heroes can pretend to get in on the action with the Ultimate Super Hero Set. Featuring some of Marvel’s iconic characters, the Captain America, Marvel’s Hawkeye, Thor, Hulk, Nick Fury, Marvel’s Black Widow, Marvel’s Vision, Iron Man, Ultron and Ultron’s Sentry figures are sized right for little hands. Marvel products are produced by Hasbro under license from Marvel Characters B.V. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

Poseable Fun Featuring simple articulation, each figure can be posed to fit any mission your little one can imagine. Playtime with the Ultimate Super Hero Set can take pretending to save the day with the Avengers to an epic level! With these awesome figures, little ones can imagine saving the day with some of their favorite Marvel characters.
Awesome Adventures Little ones can have a blast pretending to save the day with all of the figures in the Ultimate Super Hero Set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for the super hero lover. My 2.5 year old has been in love with these since he got them for Christmas and plays with them every day. They are small, but I am impressed by the mobility in the toys arms. Great quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Giftable and playable
reviews.reviewText: I like the durability of these super heroes. Bright colors as well. Plenty for single play or share time

reviews.reviewText: These are adorable and are going to make great stocking stuffers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great set for kids. Awesome price compared to others I’ve seen. Awesome gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Packaging is a nightmare
reviews.reviewText: These figurines are cute and my grandsons love them. The packaging is terrible to try and get them out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best gift for my son for Christmas. I took them out of the package and wrapped them all individually, then hid them in the tree all over. He still plays with them all the time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, durable, COOL little Marvel figures.
reviews.reviewText: My son LOVES these little guys.Devastatingly, a few months ago my son lost his Iron Man character from a single pack set that just contained Iron Man. Searching high and low we could not find the same one anywhere. However, he was included in this excellent set so we pulled the trigger.These little guys are durable! He whips them around not a single broken piece on any of them. They are made of a plastic/rubber material that is bendable, but still hard. We have a <1 year old daughter who plays with these as well and we are never concerned that her little razor sharp teeth will bite a piece off. They are made well.The characters are really cool and cute, and perfect for bringing with in the car. Each character is unique except for the two Ultrons. They are the same mold, just different colors. My son likes the Silver Ultron out of all of them!I would definitely recommend these to any Avenger lovers out there. Great quality little action figures that spur the imagination of boys and girls!
Le encantaron a mi nieto de 4 años. Están preciosos, muy bien hechos
Great toy! My son loves them. Price is good for how many you get
Un super coffret avec les héros Avengers.Ces petits personnages sont ressemblants, super jouets pour les enfants.Bonne idée cadeau.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 10, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Great toys. Just need to source more from the range
